page.title: 11TOURISM IN BUNGAY
page.content: Bungay is visited through the year by English and European tourists.The majority of tourists come during the summer,stay from 1-4 days.Some families stay for weekend breaks.Honeymoon couples also stay at Bungay.The age of tourists ranges from 30-60 years.We think that young people don't come to Bungay because there's not enough exciting attractions such as a swimming pool in Bungay.In the peak season hundreds of people come and visit the castle,the museum,the Flixton air museum and the nationally famous otter trust.The otter trust is in Earsham. They collect otters from the wild and breed them in the trust.There are also other animals and birds.It is stongly felt that Bungay should have a swimming pool,art museum and signposts to advertise exciting places.
